2Ana hīdamanūdya kiñcid vidheyaṃ pratiṣedhyaṃ veha vidyateA ityata āha--sūtreti | atha
svanibandhasya prayojanavattāpradarśanena kiṃ siddhyatītyata āha--prekṣāvaditi | nanu
vyutpitsavo vyutpattimadhikṛtya pravartante | 3ato vyutpādanapravṛtau vyutpattirevāmīṣāṃ
prayojanamiti kimapareṇa prayojanenetyata āha--vyutpādanamātrasyeti |
dvividhaṃ hi prayojanaṃ mukhyaṃ gauṇaṃ ca | tatra mukhyaṃ puruṣārtha eva | itarat tu
tadaṅgamiti | tatra mukhyārthinaḥ tatsādhanamabhyarthayamānāḥ4 tatra pravartanta iti5 tadapi
prayojanameveti6 | ato7 mukhye prayojane sati gauṇaṃ prayojanam8, tasmiṃstvasati
tadapi na syāditi niṣprayojanataivāvatiṣṭhate | na ca svātantryeṇaivāsya mukhyaṃ
prayojanamastītyato9 yasyedamaṅgaṃ tasya10 mukhyaṃ prayojanamastīti darśite prekṣāvān11
pravarttito bhavatītyabhisandhiḥ vārttikakṛta ityarthaḥ | ito'pi12 ṭīkākhaṇḍala-
kādantarbhāvitaphalavatsannidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgamiti nyāyāt śāstrāṅgamevedaṃ na
bhāṣyāṅgamiti mantavyam | na hi bhāṣyasya svātantryeṇa mukhyaṃ prayojanamasti yena
vārttikaṃ tadaṅgatāmiyāt13 | 14Atasmād yathāśruti sundaramitiA ||
nanu karmendriyaniyamaḥ śama iti suprasiddhaṃ15 śānto dānta ityādiupaniṣatsu16,
na cāsau puruṣārthaḥ | ato na mukhyaṃ prayojanamityata āha--atra ceti | nanu
